zimbra_domains_add_domain_select_title: Select a domain from the list
zimbra_domains_add_domain_input_title: Enter a domain name not managed by your OVHcloud account
zimbra_domains_add_domain_success_messag: Your add-in request has been submitted. It will be executed in a few moments.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_error_message: Unable to submit your add-in request. {{ error }}
zimbra_domains_add_domain_configuration_: How do you want to configure your DNS zone?
We configure your service to ensure the best level of security.
You can customise the configuration and choose when to switch your emails to this service.
Your domain {{domain}} will be configured in authoritative mode.
To confirm that you are the holder of the {{domain}} domain, please add this DNS record:

After adding it, wait a few minutes for your recording to propagate and for our robot to detect it.
You have 48 hours to complete this validation. You can find this information later in the list of domains.
After validating your domain, you will need to manually edit the MX, SRV, SPF and DKIM records in your DNS zone.
You can find the information required in the diagnostic page for the associated domain.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_warning_modifi: You must ensure that the DNS zone of the chosen domain can be modified by its administrator.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_configuration_: We have already confirmed that you are the holder of the {{domain}} domain. No action is expected from you.
We couldn't find any information related to this domain ID.
